quote: In quoting others, we cite ourselves.
author: Julio Cortázar

quote: Remember, we are our own griefs, my dear, we are our own happinesses and we are our own remedies.
author: Huseyn Raza

quote: Getting rid of a delusion makes us wiser than getting hold of a truth.
author: Ludwig Börne

quote: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: Earl Nightingale
